G

GameLogic - Class in Unnamed Package
class GameLogic contains all logic related components of the game. 1. the integer array "positions" with 24 entries which represents all possible positions where you can place a gaming piece. 2. the boolean variable "spieler1zug" which states whether it is player one's turn or not.
GameLogic() - Constructor for class GameLogic
Constructs and initializes a game logic object with parameters positions[] and spieler1zug.
GameScreen - Class in Unnamed Package
The Game Screen is the Screen the actual game is played on.
GameScreen(Spieler, Spieler) - Constructor for class GameScreen
Constructs and initializes the Game Screen with set attributes.
getAnzahl() - Method in class GameLogic
get method for the number of stones a player has placed
getNumSteine() - Method in class Spieler
Get-Method for number of remaining pieces to be placed
getPositions() - Method in class GameLogic
get method for the positions[] array.
getPositions(int) - Method in class GameLogic
get method returning a specific entry in positions.
getSpielerName() - Method in class Spieler
Get-Method for player name
getZug() - Method in class GameLogic
get method for the spieler1zug variable
Gewinner - Class in Unnamed Package
Gewinner is the screen being displayed after the game has been finished and a winner has been established.
Gewinner(Spieler, Spieler, String) - Constructor for class Gewinner
Constructs and initializes GewinnerScreen with set attributes and passed names
